description: Hotel Arts Barcelona is a landmark with perfect credentials as a premier destination within a destination. An urban resort that stands as the tallest hotel on the coast, overlooking the beachfront offering panoramic city and beach views. The hotel effortlessly combines tranquility and genuine luxury with individual and personalized service provided by a well-connected and passionate team. Offering panoramic city and beach views, the guestrooms, suites and luxury, serviced penthouses are light-filled, luxuriously comfortable. Gastronomy is an inherent part of Hotel Arts Barcelona offering five gastronomic restaurants and a cocktail bar. The hotel has a unique collection of open and leisure spaces exceptional in Barcelona. The artfully designed Infinity Pool and family pool overlook the gardens, offering an oasis of calm by day and vibrant hot spot at night. 43 The Spa, located on the 43rd floor, floating high above the city, captures organic luxury and a sense of well-being.

description: The AlmaBarcelona hotel is housed in an elegant building which dates back to the start of the 20th Century. Located right in the heart of Barcelona, just a few metres from the famous Passeig de Gràcia. With its proximity to the Batlló house, La Pedrera, Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona Cathedral, Palau de la Música, L'Auditori and numerous other popular tourist attractions, the AlmaBarcelona has one of the best locations in the city. Its 72 rooms are separated into classical and modernist accommodation, providing an interior unlike any other.

description: Ohla Eixample is a hotel featuring contemporary design, fabulous cuisine and a one-of-a-kind outdoor pool in Barcelona with a cosy chill-out space located on the hotel rooftop. Located in the heart of the Eixample district, between the exclusive Avinguda Diagonal and the famous Passeig de Gràcia, this hotel is known for its minimalist concept, modern setting and personalised service. Designed by architect Daniel Isern, the façade of this building is one of its highlights, featuring ceramic-based materials. It is also an ambitious and unique project, due to the robotics technique that used the music of Max Richter to create ceramic pieces that undoubtedly contribute to the extraordinary end product. The result is a boutique hotel with 94 rooms, all modern and bright, equipped with all sorts of creature comforts: 40-inch and 55-inch television, satellite channels, free high-speed Wi-Fi, dimmable lights, designer amenities, rain shower and 24 hour room service, among others. Ohla Eixample uses 21st century technology with different finishes and enamelling whose shape hides a line of lights that illuminate the façade at night with a finish reminiscent of paper. A magnificent combination of splendour and harmony that makes Ohla Eixample a meeting point for an unforgettable stay. The menu at Xerta Restaurant (1 Michelin start from November 16) is perfect for anyone looking to discover the culinary secrets of the Ebro region. Chef Fran López is in charge of the kitchen, representing the best version of this cuisine with products from the sea and the land perfectly selected to bring the truest flavours of the Delta to the city of Barcelona
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

description:
Let the adventures begin at DO Plaça Reial — steps from La Rambla on its namesake square. This restored 19th-century façade features shuttered windows, Juliet balconies, and neoclassical archways. And the rooftop terrace overlooks palm trees and iconic street lamps designed by Antonio Gaudí. Bar Tomate BCN serves delicious tapas and paella dishes downstairs on the patio. And complimentary breakfast is available every morning. Plus, the rooftop pool is a perfect spot to cool off on hot days. Or you can unwind with a session in the sauna. Each space features cable television and a minimalist design with warm wooden furnishings. Outside, the Gothic Quarter has endless cafés, bars, boutiques, and historic landmarks to discover. From impressive basilicas to stunning theatres, like Gran Teatre del Liceu. See the best of Barcelona at DO Plaça Reial. This is a central location and prone to noise.

description: Sofitel Barcelona Skipper French luxury and local cuisine in the world's most exciting city Sofitel Barcelona Skipper is creating a journey to effortless, irreverent elegance, capturing the essence of Barcelona & France. Both places take risks, and transform and reinvent the classic aspect. Be sure to visit Barcelona whatever the reason. Even the tightest schedules allow you to grab a few seconds to relax and admire the stunning views from Sofitel Barcelona Skipper, located next to Barceloneta Beach. This hotel has 2 fantastic swimming pools, a solarium and many other things for you to rest and feel at home. Also don't miss the tasty tapas at its restaurant TENDIEZ. Barcelona, the city of Gaudí, is one of Spain's most modern cities for good reason, hosting major technology exhibitions like Mobile World. Not everything is focused on the future, though; history and culture are essential to understand its people. Hotel Sofitel is opposite Barceloneta, its best-known beach. A few minutes' walk is the Gothic Quarter, a major tourist attractions of Barcelona. It is well connected to the airport and the train station.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Accor Hotels.

description: Hotel El Palace Barcelona was totally refurbished and reopened late 2009. The works preserved the classic spirit that has always characterised this property, distinguished as a symbol of Barcelona’s hotel tradition. Set in the heart of the city centre, close to Las Ramblas and in the most prestigious shopping area, it is surrounded by boulevards, theatres and main banks. It has an excellent transport connections and it is just 20 min from el Prat Airport.After the restoration, the Hotel has 120 rooms, 42 of which are suites and junior suites, all equipped with last-generation technology. A new room design, a soft interior re-decoration of public areas and lounges and the realignment and optimisation of the architectural infrastructure enhances the beauty and majesty of our Hotel like in the 20’s.

description: Nestled in-between old Roman walls, the Mercer Hotel Barcelona is an intimate boutique hotel with 28 exclusive rooms located by the ancient Gothic quarter, walking distance to the city’s main sights. The hotel building incorporates part of the ancient Roman wall dated 1st century A.D. and a defense tower with original paintings. The 28 exclusive rooms with designer furniture, luxurious toiletries and modern bathrooms provide a peaceful and charming atmosphere, including a beautiful rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool, for exclusive guest use. The excellence of service, intimacy, luxury casual design and personal care are the distinctive elements that will make a stay a truly memorable experience.

description: Grand Hotel Central, a home in the heart of Barcelona where the amenities and luxuries of a five-star hotel are combined with a sense of style and elegance. The hotel has a perfect location between the Gothic district with its spectacular Cathedral or the ancient city walls and "el Born". 147 spacious rooms & suites with the best of modern design. Its very famous infinity pool, the Avalon Restaurant where the awarded Chef Ramon Freixa presents affordable cuisine to share with friends, the stylish the City Bar offering all day dining including salads, sandwiches and a wide cocktail menu surrounded by good music in a relaxing atmosphere, the Gallery our art space perfect for private events, the Wellness Suite with its carefully designed treatments, the Thermal Suite that offers a private steam and sauna experience, the well equipped Fitness Center, and a dedicated team who understands your specific requirements for any meeting or event in one of our multiples spaces... description:

In addition to the magnificent panoramic terrace and rooftop swimming pool, we dispose of 105 rooms and fine gastronomic offer including high-level Mediterranean cuisine in our Restaurant Galaxó and music sessions at the Jazz Club in the Café Vienés.

This elegant 5-star boutique hotel overlooking the new luxury Port Vell alongside the Mediterranean Sea, offers a unique hideaway with a modern understated decor. Ideal for your weekend breaks, business trips and luxury holidays in the heart of Barcelona. It boasts a cool, trendy atmosphere, world class amenities and dedicated personal service for a truly memorable hotel experience in the first studio of Pablo Picasso on vibrant Barrio Gotico. Restaurant Informal Our Michelin Star Chef invites you to experience his Catalan specialties in a delicious selection of Mediterranean tapas, prepared from fresh seasonal ingredients sourced from our local market. description: Ohla Barcelona Hotel is a five-star boutique hotel located in the historical center of the city Barcelona, surrounded by three of the city's most popular sight-seeing and shopping areas: the Gothic Quarter, the Born and the Eixample. Inaugurated in February 2011, its location is perfect for tourism, shopping or business, with a fusion of calm serenity and the bustle of downtown Barcelona. The project has left untouched the building's historical facade from 1920 and other listed elements, including the main staircase, while giving the establishment a cutting-edge, minimalist interior design that combines various textures of black, white and oak wood. The building stands out for the sculpture on the facade by world-renowned artist, Frederic Amat. The hotel has 74 rooms, all equipped with a 40-inch TV screen and satellite channels, free Wi-Fi, telephone, safe box with room for a 17-inch laptop, adjustable lighting, individual thermostat, Egyptian cotton sheets, robe, slippers, kettle and minibar. Its culinary spaces are one of the highlights of the hotel, which locals consider great meeting points: Caelis restaurant, awarded with a Michelin star; La Plassohla, 'tapas' and small plates and Vistro 49, a boutique bar specialized in wines and cocktails. The terrace and the enclosed pool, the only one of its kind in Barcelona, have been called one of the best places to relax and enjoy a spectacular view of the city. Meeting rooms, gym, sauna and massage room, internet corner and parking garage are just some of the other services the department of Public Relations can offer to even further personalize each guest's stay and ensure it is an unforgettable experience. In short, a world of experiences that the whole Ohla Barcelona team offers guests looking for a hotel with charm and personality in the center of Barcelona.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

description:
The fully renovated Melia Barcelona Sarria is a luxury city hotel with a strategic location in the financial, cultural and commercial heart of the city of Barcelona. Only a few minutes from Avenida Diagonal, the Paseo de Gracia and the Football Club Barcelona Camp Nou Stadium, it is the perfect choice both for business and leisure travellers. Near the stops for the tourist bus, the hotel is also located in one of the city’s main cultural and entertainment districts. Its privileged location in center city Barcelona allows guests rapid access by public transportation or a peaceful stroll to the city's main touristic and cultural points of interest; and also outstanding shopping and commercial areas of the City of Gaudi.
Pets not allowed.

description:
21st-century ultra-modern decor and luxuries harmonize with the preserved 1906 modernista (Art Nouveau) artistry of this landmark suite only boutique hotel.
Six two-bedroom, two-bath, extremely spacious apartment-style suites (1,615 square feet), can accommodate up to four guests. Similar in layout, the suites feature a fully-equipped kitchen, dining room, living room, stellar contemporary furnishings, and state-of-the-art technology throughout. 
Guests enjoy utmost privacy at the rooftop private spa and terrace. Spa facilities include a wooden Finnish sauna, treatment rooms and massage tables, outdoor saltwater jacuzzi with hydro-massage “beds”, and solarium for sun tanning.The bar and al-fresco lounge area are ideal for yoga, simply relaxing, or for gatherings.  
A personal assistant is assigned to each suite throughout your stay: multilingual, knowledgeable about Barcelona tourism, museums, shopping, entertainment and dining, they can make all your arrangements.

description:
A cultural destination of its own.
Set just off of Passeig de Gràcia—Barcelona’s grand, humming shopping boulevard—and a few doors down from Gaudí’s masterpiece Casa Milà, Sir Victor reflects and amplifies the vibrant, creative spirit of the city. With 91 impeccable guest rooms, incredible city views, a luxe spa, lively restaurant, rooftop pool, private members’ club and numerous meeting spaces, it’s a rendez-vous spot for visitors and locals alike. Sir Victor’s bright, big and beautiful guest rooms reflect the inspiring world of Barcelona humming just outside. People-watch Passeig de Gràcia from your balcony or hide away in your own tranquil space if that’s what you prefer.

description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Barcelona does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Miramar Barcelona, a nice option for travelers like you.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a concierge and room service while staying at Hotel Miramar Barcelona. In addition, Hotel Miramar Barcelona offers a pool and an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Barcelona trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
Close to some of Barcelona's most popular landmarks, such as Montjuic Castle (0.6 mi) and Passeig de Gracia (1.5 mi), Hotel Miramar Barcelona is a great destination for tourists.
Barcelona has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like 7 Portes, Botafumeiro, and El Nacional, which are serving up some great dishes.
If you are interested in exploring Barcelona, check out one of the architectural buildings, such as Basilica of the Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo, and Casa Milà - La Pedrera.
Hotel Miramar Barcelona puts the best of Barcelona at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

description: GASTRONOMY, ARCHITECTURE AND DESIGN... A UNIQUE GOURMET EXPERIENCE ABaC Restaurant Hotel Monument 5* GL with a 3*Michelin Restaurant headed by chef Jordi Cruz, is located in Sarria-Sant Gervasi, the upper zone of Barcelona, with views to the Kennedy square and surrounded with the vegetation of La Tamarita gardens. Close to the most important points of the city. Work of the architect Antoni de Moragas, consists of two buildings integrated in a garden. The centennial building was refurbished due to its historical value and it was the old residence of Dona Madronita, an intellectual of the born Catalan bourgeoisie at the end of XIX century. She was the daughter of the famous pharmacist Dr. Andreu, and she was the wife of the North American Max Klein (president of the Chamber of Commerce of the United States and one of the introducers of the basketball in Spain). On the other hand, the new crystal pavilion is covered of lattices of wood and joined the garden. Landscape and architecture give themselves the hand in a space of pure lines.

description: This is a 5-star hotel located on Barcelona's famous Les Rambles, in the heart of the city's Gothic Quarter. Right in the middle of Barcelona's largest cultural and shopping areas, close to the Museum of Contemporary Art (MACBA), the Gran Teatre del Liceu opera house, the Cathedral and the emblematic Boqueria market-museum occupies the building that was the historic palace of El Regulador. It also houses the Masriera museum and function room, a permanent showcase for pieces by this most international Art Nouveau jeweler: Masriera. The hotel has 31 luxury rooms, most with views of Les Rambles or the famous Carme Street, each displaying an exclusive piece of Masriera jewelry. Don't miss the opportunity to stay at Barcelona's new jewel! Services: 31 guest rooms: 3 single rooms, 21 Superior (14 double and 7 twin), 4 Deluxe and 3 Jewel Suite. Restaurant - Bistrot El Regulador Cocktail bar El Regulador Terrace with outdoor swimming pool and solarium with views of Barcelona's Gothic Quarter and Raval district Breakfast buffet 24-hour room service and mini-bar Business Center Wi-Fi in all areas Function rooms and spaces for events: poolside terrace, swimming pool, Gym and sauna. Bagués-Masriera museum Laundry and ironing service Safe in reception Parking nearby (a charge applies) Small dogs allowed (except in bars and restaurants)

description: Renaissance Barcelona Hotel, perfectly positioned in Barcelona city center, provokes discovery at every turn. The hotel is steps away from Paseo de Gracia, near Las Ramblas and is surrounded by exclusive shopping, dining and endless cultural attractions.

roomTips/0/text: Great for walking, shopping and dining.  The bar is the best along with the rooftop bar GOJA

roomTips/4/text: Breakfast is great at the hotel, don't pass it up. Then get out and explore

description: Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battlo and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa. The pre-modernist heritage that emanates from its walls. Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. They all have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and Jo Malone toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views. The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria (1 Michelin star), serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy. Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 m away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

description: Hidden among the alleys of the historic Gothic Quarter of Barcelona lies the Hotel Wittmore. 22 rooms located a few meters from the sea where you can discover the secrets of the most creative scene of the city. Let yourself wander through its streets until you find us.

roomTips/1/text: Double-check the information you are given at the front desk, we found at times it was not accurate
roomTips/2/text: It can be difficult for taxi drivers to find the hotel. Have an address ready for them, or ask the hotel to pick you up nearby via walking.
roomTips/3/text: Don't miss out the welcome drink & the goodies in the mini bar.
roomTips/4/text: The bedroom was a good size, quiet and had shutters over the windows so you will get a fantastic night's sleep.

description: Located on the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Barcelona is perfectly placed for you to explore all of the city's major attractions. With interiors by leading Spanish designer Patricia Urquiola, our 120 rooms and suites are among the most luxurious in Barcelona. Serving mouth-watering cuisine and drinks in immaculate Catalan surroundings, our bar and restaurants exude enviable style. Designed as a haven of serenity and calm, our highly acclaimed spa offers a wide range of holistic treatments and therapies.

description: Located in the heart of the Gothic Quarter and surrounded by the old Jewish Quarter, the Hotel Neri occupies two historic buildings, one of them being a magnificent 12th century medieval palace, from which the old courtyard was recovered, and the sgraffito found, considered to be of the most important in the city. The design of our hotel blends with relaxing music and stimulating scents to create a unique and sensual atmosphere. Located a few steps from the cathedral, it is the ideal place to discover Barcelona on foot. In addition, the hotel invites the client to enjoy the good weather and relax on the private rooftop terrace, Roba Estesa. Being the only Relais & Châteaux hotel in Barcelona and having been awarded as a hotel that adds value to the city's heritage, makes it even more special and unique. In Neri you can breathe the Gothic Quarter and savor the passage of time. The magic of living with the calm and sobriety of other times, but with the comforts and comfort of the 21st century.

roomTips/0/text: Be careful when opening the door of your taxi — the left side opens into an active bike lane and the right side opens into traffic!
roomTips/1/text: Location cannot be beat, walking distance to many good restaurants, train stations, historical sites.
roomTips/2/text: Avoid the Metro. Be constantly aware of your personal belongings and surroundings. Don’t take designer handbags or expensive jewellery.
roomTips/3/text: Taxi from airport should cost around 35€ and takes around 30 minutes or purchase a travel card for discounted travel on public transport
roomTips/4/text: Location is Really Good for touring about in Barcelona

description:
The adventure starts at Paseo de Gracia. Named after the iconic street it overlooks, the elegant façade features wrought-iron balconies and beautiful stone details. Each space includes a desk, modern furnishings, and a comfortable bed. Kickstart your day with stunning views on the rooftop terrace. And breakfast is available for an additional fee. Ready to explore? High-end stores, historic buildings, and thriving bars and restaurants line the streets of Eixample. We love the iconic masterpieces of Antonio Gaudi's Casa Batlló and Casa Milà, a few blocks away. Get the best of Barcelona at Paseo de Gracia. Due to the central location, noise may be present.

Use the Sonder app to navigate your stay from start to finish. Check in. Request amenities. Connect to WiFi. Contact customer support. All via our small (but mighty) app. Whatever you need, we’ve got you covered.

This Sonder has a front desk which is staffed 24/7. Our on-site team is available to ensure you have a better stay.
